title: Programming Practical Skills Enhancement: Higher-Order Thinking Skills Development Using Digital Tools: Experimentalism

context.prior_knowledge: Basic smartphone usage skills and general understanding of social issues
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can generate multidimensional analytical materials on social issues using digital collaboration tools (e.g., Google Docs, Padlet)
Learners can select credible information by applying online verification tools (e.g., fact-checking websites, reverse image search)
Learners can visually represent solutions to social problems using digital storytelling tools (e.g., Canva, CapCut)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
